None.name: Normal mode
None.info: Cancel the current mode and return to normal mode

None.name: Prefix
None.info: Numbers are used as a prefix for motions and commands

None.name: Prefix
None.info: Numbers are used as a prefix for motions and commands

None.name: Start of line
None.info: Move the cursor to the beginning of the line

None.name: Move - back
None.info: Move the cursor one character to the left

None.name: Macro - record
None.info: Start recording a macro

None.name: Word - forward
None.info: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next word or non-word character

Shift.name: WORD
Shift.info: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next word after a whitespace

None.name: Move - end of word
None.info: Move the cursor to the next end of a word

None.name: Replace
None.info: Replace the character under the cursor with the next character typed

None.name: Till (Prefix Key)
None.info: Move (t{motion}) the cursor to the character before the next occurrence of a character

None.name: Scroll / Fold (Prefix Key)
None.info: z can be used in combination with other keys to perform various actions like scrolling and folding

None.name: Undo
None.info: Undo the last change

None.name: Insert Mode - before
None.info: Enter insert mode before the cursor

None.name: Insert Mode - line below
None.info: Enter insert mode on the line below the cursor

None.name: Paste
None.info: Paste the most recently copied or cut text

None.name: Move line down
None.info: Move a line down

None.name: Move line down
None.info: Move a line down

None.name: Insert Mode - after
None.info: Enter insert mode after the cursor

None.name: Substitute{motion} (Operator)
None.info: Delete the motion or text object and enter insert mode

None.name: Delete{motion} (Operator)
None.info: Delete a specified motion or text object

None.name: Find (Prefix) - forward
None.info: Find (f{letter}) the next occurrence of the search term

None.name: Miscellaneous - (Prefix Key)
None.info: The g key can be used as a prefix key to access various commands, its functionality is context dependent. It gets combined with other keys to perform various actions like movement, file operations, text manipulation, etc.

None.name: Move Left
None.info: Move the cursor to the left

None.name: Move Down
None.info: Move the cursor to the left

None.name: Move Up
None.info: Move the cursor to the left

None.name: Move Right
None.info: Move the cursor to the Right

None.name: Search - backwards
None.info: Search for the word under the cursor backwards through the file

None.name: Outdent (Operator)
None.info: Outdents the current line by one tab stop

None.name: Yank (Operator)
None.info: Copy the next movement or text object

None.name: Change (Operator)
None.info: Change the text object under the cursor

None.name: Visual Mode
None.info: Enter visual mode to select/highlight text

None.name: Word - backwards
None.info: Move to the beginning of the previous word

None.name: Search - forwards
None.info: Cicle through the search results forwards

Shift.name: Search - backwards
Shift.info: Cicle through the search results backwards

None.name: Mark (Prefix Key)
None.info: Mark (m{letter}) the current position in the file so you can easily return to this position later with '{letter}

None.name: Repeat movement
None.info: Repeat the last movement command in the same direction

None.name: Repeat last change
None.info: Repeat the last change command

None.name: Move up
None.info: Move the cursor up one line

None.name: Move characterwise
None.info: Move the cursor one character to the right

None.name: Move left
None.info: Move the cursor one character to the left

None.name: Move down
None.info: Move the cursor down one line

None.name: Move up
None.info: Move the cursor up one line

None.name: Move right
None.info: Move the cursor one character to the right
